function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious agents not solely correlated with the size of the microbes in droplet nuclei or larger droplets","Impact":"Increased risk of infection spread through airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Use of higher facepiece filtering devices, such as N95 respirators","Technologies":"N95 respirators, ventilation systems","People":"Health care personnel, susceptible individuals","Owner":"Health care facilities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Pathogen-laden droplets expelled during medical procedures may travel further and reach deeper into the respiratory tract of susceptible persons","Impact":"Potential for increased infection risk for susceptible individuals","Mitigation":"Implementation of measures to control the spread of pathogen-laden droplets, use of N95 respirators","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, infection control measures, N95 respirators","People":"Health care personnel, susceptible individuals","Owner":"Health care facilities, infection control authorities"}]}
